title: Typophile suggestions
content:
Some ideas on improving the site (I think I emailed about this before, but figured I'd post about it).

1) Setup an option to email us notifcations of any replies on new posts. I really miss this feature other forums have.  
2) The track page needs a space after "Forum topic" (small nitpick)
author: s0me0ne

comments.content: Hi. You can send feedback to them here: [http://typophile.com/contact](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131105539/http:/typophile.com/contact "http://typophile.com/contact")
